upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

address-autofill-desktop-pref-release-ro.userFacingName: Address Autofill Desktop ( Pref, Release Rollout )

phc-rollout.userFacingDescription: Roll out the Probabilistic Heap Checker in Firefox Release.

disable-redirects-for-authretries.userFacingDescription: Rollback Redirection of the http channel for Authentication retries.

encrypted-client-hello-fallback-mechanis.userFacingDescription: This experiment enables a fallback mechanism for Encrypted Client Hello. This feature maximizes compatibility with websites that have misconfigured or unexpected DNS configurations.

fpp-floating-point-protection-rollout-li.userFacingName: FPP: Floating Point Protection Rollout (Linux Only)
fpp-floating-point-protection-rollout-li.userFacingDescription: This is a rollout of FPP Floating Point Value protections on Desktop for Linux and Mac so that floating point values cannot be used as a fingerprinting vector between platforms.

long-term-holdback-2025h1-growth-desktop.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for 2025 H1 Growth experiments

$l10n.text: Didn’t mean to close that tab?
Find and reopen it quickly here. We keep a history of your recently closed tabs for you.

$l10n.comment: Closes message and blocks message ID
Dismisses message and reduces frequency of message
Primary button label that routes to about:firefoxview

value.targeting: !isMajorUpgrade && !willShowDefaultPrompt && !activeNotifications && previousSessionEnd && fxViewButtonAreaType != null && tabsClosedCount >= 5 && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.features' | preferenceValue == true && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.addons' | preferenceValue == true

fx-view-discoverability-2025-rollout.userFacingDescription: Message Experiment:  Discovery of Firefox View

de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Sie wollten diesen Tab nicht schließen?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Durchsuchen Sie alle Ihre offenen und geschlossenen Tabs, um ihn schnell zu finden.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Hier können Sie sie schnell finden und wieder öffnen. Wir speichern eine Chronik Ihrer kürzlich geschlossenen Tabs für Sie.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Wir zeigen Ihnen alle geöffneten Tabs in allen Fenstern.

fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Vous ne vouliez pas fermer cet onglet ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Recherchez dans tous vos onglets ouverts et fermés pour le trouver rapidement.
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Retrouvez-le et rouvrez-le rapidement ici. Nous conservons un historique des onglets que vous avez récemment fermés.
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Nous vous affichons tous vos onglets ouverts, dans toutes vos fenêtres.

it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Cerca in tutte le tue schede, sia aperte che chiuse, per trovarla velocemente.
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Qui puoi trovarla e riaprirla velocemente. Conserviamo per te una cronologia delle schede chiuse di recente.
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Ti mostreremo tutte le schede aperte, in tutte le finestre.
it.fx-view-discoverability-split-button-opt: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento

en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Didn’t mean to close that tab?
en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Search across all your open and closed tabs to quickly find it.
en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Find and reopen it quickly here. We keep a history of your recently closed tabs for you.
en-CA.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: We’ll show you every tab you have open, across all your windows.

en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Didn’t mean to close that tab?
en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Search across all your open and closed tabs to quickly find it.
en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Find and reopen it quickly here. We keep a history of your recently closed tabs for you.
en-GB.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: We’ll show you every tab you have open, across all your windows.

en-US.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-US.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Didn’t mean to close that tab?
en-US.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Can’t find the tab you need?
en-US.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Search across all your open and closed tabs to quickly find it.

extensions-migration-in-import-wizard-11.userFacingDescription: This rollout makes extension migration available to users migrating from Chrome to Firefox.

fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2.userFacingDescription: Enable sending the Fx Accounts ping.

disable-ads-startup-cache.userFacingDescription: Reduce the number of old / out of date ads shown on New Tab

new-alt-text-flow-and-generation-treatme.userFacingName: New alt text flow and generation in PDFs - for EN-* locales outside of EU+EEA
new-alt-text-flow-and-generation-treatme.userFacingDescription: This experiment offers users improved alt text flow upon adding an image to a PDF and functionality that generates alt text for images added to PDFs using a small, local, and fully private language model.

messages.targeting: source == 'startup' && !isMajorUpgrade && !activeNotifications && !isDefaultBrowser && !willShowDefaultPrompt && (currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated|date) / 86400000 < 28 && (currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated|date) / 86400000 >= 7 && previousSessionEnd && userPrefs.cfrFeatures == true

fox-doodle-and-tail-fox-2025-v2-rollout.userFacingName: Fox Doodle and Tail Fox 2025 V2 - Rollout
fox-doodle-and-tail-fox-2025-v2-rollout.userFacingDescription: Set to default prompt highlighting benefits of choosing Firefox

unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingName: Unified API for spocs and top sites - controlled rollout for release 133+
unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingDescription: We're switching to a new endpoint for the services supplying sponsored content and top sites to the new tab. This is a controlled rollout for 133 on the Release channel to that new endpoint.

fox-doodle-multi-action-cta-2025-rollout.userFacingDescription: Rollout: Setting Firefox as primary browser

ai-chatbot-rollout-in-the-old-sidebar.userFacingDescription: Updating the list of tools in the sidebar to include an opt-in feature that, in the case of opt-in, allows users to see the chatbot website side-by-side with open tabs.

$l10n.text: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

$l10n.text: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingName: PDF Annotations - Highlight - Treatment B Rollout
pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message in the PDF viewer that introduces the highlight toolbar button, and offers users a way to set Firefox as the default PDF handler, if it is not already.

de.screen-1-header: Hervorhebung in PDFs ist ab sofort möglich!
de.screen-2-subtitle: Sie haben jedes Mal Zugriff auf unsere Werkzeuge, wenn Sie eine PDF-Datei öffnen.
de.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Mit unserem neuen Textmarker-Werkzeug können Sie PDFs an einem Ort lesen und bearbeiten.

fr.screen-1-header: Vous pouvez désormais surligner vos PDF !
fr.screen-2-header: Faire de Firefox votre éditeur PDF par défaut ?
fr.screen-2-subtitle: Vous aurez accès à nos outils à chaque fois que vous ouvrirez un fichier PDF.
fr.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Avec notre nouvel outil de surlignage, vous pouvez consulter et modifier des fichiers PDF sans avoir besoin d’un autre logiciel.

it.screen-1-header: Ora puoi evidenziare i tuoi PDF!
it.screen-2-header: Impostare Firefox come editor predefinito per i PDF?
it.screen-2-subtitle: Avrai accesso ai nostri strumenti ogni volta che apri un PDF.
it.feature-tour-submenu-item-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Grazie al nuovo strumento evidenziatore puoi leggere e modificare i PDF senza bisogno di altri software.

en-CA.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-CA.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-CA.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-CA.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
